channel.title: Hammer's game_mp_gamerules entity
channel.description: Can someone explain how to work with game_mp_gamerules ?

item.title: Hammer's game_mp_gamerules entity
item.dc:creator: LordDz
item.description:
Next to the smartedit button in Hammer, there is a help button. Pressing it shows all the inputs for the selected entity.

Anyhow these are the inputs you can play around with:
EnableCanisterDrops Re-enable the canister drops on death. (Canisters drop by default)

DisableCanisterDrops Disable canister drops on death. (Canisters drop by default)

SetPointsPerFrag Set how many points one frag is.

Read full topic
